snippet.title: Hollow Flowers - Official Teaser Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: Hollow Flowers is a transmedia project in the development stage and involves the creation of a short film, an animated series, a video game, and a comic. Take a look at the latest teaser trailer for Hollow Flowers with more information to come in the future.
